answers.answer: Hi,How is your husband? I understand your concern and it is important that he see his attending physician or nephrologist  especially with an elevated creatinine and history of transplants. It is important to know his  kidney function also and to make sure that co-morbid conditions such as his diabetes is also managed. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: not dialysis candidate was  for  5  years  kidney transplant 18  years ago  heart problems  blind diebetic 54 years old  sorry  my husband  creation  level 4.1  is there anything  what maybe other warning signs
title: 2  kidney transplant
